name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.expiry
description:
Cache expiry time for a Key, after which the cache Queue for this
    key will be dropped. Default = 12hrs

name: dfs.namenode.top.num.users
description: Number of top users returned by the top tool

name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.streams.cache.expiry.ms
description:
This controls the minimum amount of time
    file descriptors need to sit in the client cache context
    before they can be closed for being inactive for too long.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.

name: hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity
description:
Indicates how long (in seconds) an authentication token is valid before it has
    to be renewed.

name: dfs.client.cached.conn.retry
description:
The number of times the HDFS client will pull a socket from the
   cache.  Once this number is exceeded, the client will try to create a new
   socket.
